alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 9:55PM CDT until May 06 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HANCOCK...CENTRAL LEE AND NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 955 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Argyle, or 9 miles northeast of Kahoka, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Donnellson, St. Francisville, Argyle, Vincennes and Lee County Fairgrounds around 1000 PM CDT. New Boston, Charleston and Wilson Lake around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Montrose, Keokuk Airport, Summitville, Mooar, Chatfield Park, Keokuk, Nauvoo, Nauvoo State Park, Bluff Park, Galland, Sandusky, Camp Eastman, Niota, Dallas City, Ferris, Adrian, Colusa and Pontoosuc. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
